column4: are there any irssi themes that color nick names so rooms look more organized
the irssi homepage has tons of themes/scripts for that
weechat can also do that feature.
I've tried themes but all just make the text all one color really
its not a theme thing. its a script thing
thanks
i copy extra fonts to my users /home/username/.fonts dir all the time.
huh?
I think your talking to the wrong person
you could edit the /etc/default/grub to set the proper default. or the /etc/grub.d/config
thanks I'll try that
which one is propor to edit though?
no idea. Check the grub docs.  its listed in one of those.
yes. It has worked.. but i am sure to always have windows 'unmount' any of the linux filesystems when i dont need them.
thanks, do you know if it can format drives to ext2 aswell?
no idea.
thats a setting of the channel.   nothing on your end.
ok cool, so what channel setting is that (so I understand it)?
if theres an 'attack' they can set Unreg'ed users to go to that channel instead of here.
makes sense, thank you
you have to use the 'offset' feature of mount i recall.
i saw a guide on it once...
ah that's what I was thinking... I wonder how to find that
fdisk -l on the file i recall.. and then  figure otu the #'s from there
